TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is an NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He was represented before the ORG by PERSON N. Abdullayev , a lawyer practising in GPE . The respondent Government was represented by PERSON , Agent of GPE before the ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant was an executive director of ORG ( hereinafter the “ Company ” ) , a commercial legal entity with its headquarters in GPE . According to the ORG ’s articles of incorporation , its sole founder and owner was ORG . The latter was a non - profit public association aimed at providing social and other public - benefit assistance to the population . The applicant was appointed as the ORG ’s director pursuant to a decision of ORG , the sole shareholder in the Company .

By an order of DATE , issued by ORG ( GPE şəhəri PERSON ; hereinafter “ ORG ) , the Company was provided with a plot of land for construction of an office building . By DATE , the Company had started the construction work on the site . However , on an unspecified date in DATE , ORG repealed its order of DATE and ordered the demolition of the ORG ’s building .

The ORG filed a lawsuit against ORG , seeking compensation for damages . The Company was represented by the applicant , in his capacity of the ORG ’s director , and by GPE , the ORG deputy director . By a judgment of DATE , ORG held that , as a result of the building ’s demolition by ORG , the Company sustained financial damages in the amount of CARDINAL NORP Manats ( GPE . The court ordered ORG to compensate the Company for these damages .

No appeal was filed against the judgment and it entered into legal force . On DATE ORG issued a writ of execution of the judgment . Following ORG ’s failure to pay the compensation , on DATE another writ of execution was issued .

However , instead of compensating the Company in accordance with the judgment , it appears that , on DATE , ORG provided it with another plot of land for construction of a new building . On this ground , ORG filed an appeal with the President of ORG , asking to reopen the case due to the “ discovery of new facts ” and to reconsider the judgment of DATE .

By a letter of DATE , the President of ORG rejected ORG ’s request . The President explained that the case could be reopened due to the discovery of new facts only if such new facts had existed at the time of examination of the case by the first - instance court , but were unknown to the court at that time . However , since the new plot of land was transferred to the Company in DATE , after the judgment of DATE had entered into force , it could not be considered as a basis for reopening of the proceedings . Moreover , ORG President noted that the transfer of the new plot to the Company could not be considered as a substitute for compensation for the ORG ’s financial damages sustained as a result of the demolition of its first office building in DATE .

Following ORG ’s continuous failure to execute the judgment , on DATE ORG No . CARDINAL ( CARDINAL saylı PERSON ) issued a special order , directing ORG to bring ORG ’s responsible officials under criminal liability for non - execution of the valid court judgment . On DATE ORG refused to institute criminal proceedings against ORG officials , holding that there was no documentary evidence showing that the writ of execution had ever been presented directly to ORG .
On DATE ORG No . CARDINAL issued a new writ of execution which was sent to ORG through FAC rayon PERSON və PERSON şöbəsi ; hereinafter the “ ORG ” ) .

On DATE BCEA notified ORG that it was impossible to comply with the judgment of DATE , because ORG did not have sufficient funds allocated from the state budget for the purpose of compensating the Company .

On DATE ORG informed ORG and the applicant , in his capacity of the ORG ’s director , that the enforcement proceedings were still pending and insisted that ORG execute the judgment . On DATE BCEA notified the applicant that the issue of the compensation was referred to ORG . On DATE ORG informed the applicant that the issue was further referred to ORG .
Upon a petition by ORG , on DATE ORG imposed an administrative fine on ORG in the amount of FAC for failure to comply with the judgment of DATE .

The applicant , in the meantime , wrote letters to the President , ORG and ORG , complaining about the continuing nonexecution . In reply , he was again informed that the matter was under consideration by ORG .
On DATE ORG informed the applicant that , despite all of the efforts to ensure the enforcement of the judgment in accordance with the law , ORG consistently failed to comply with the judgment .
Finally , on DATE the judgment was executed and ORG transferred ORG to the ORG ’s bank account .

Article CARDINAL of LAW provides that legal entities can be represented before courts by their bodies , acting within the scope of powers conferred on them by law , regulations or articles of incorporation of the legal entity , or by representatives acting on the basis of a power of attorney .
